inputSpec.name: assay
inputSpec.label: assay
inputSpec.help: string of assay to run analysis for (CEN or TWE)

inputSpec.name: assay_config_dir
inputSpec.label: assay config dir
inputSpec.help: path to directory containing assay config files

inputSpec.name: assay_config_file
inputSpec.label: assay config file
inputSpec.help: Config file for assay, if not provided will search assay_config_dir for files

inputSpec.name: qc_file
inputSpec.label: QC file
inputSpec.help: QC .xlsx file, required if running eggd_artemis

inputSpec.name: split_tests
inputSpec.label: split tests
inputSpec.help: controls if to split multiple panels / genes in a manifest to individual reports instead of being combined into one

inputSpec.name: exclude_samples
inputSpec.label: exclude samples
inputSpec.help: comma separated string of samples to exclude from CNV calling / CNV reports (these should be formatted as ` InstrumentID-SpecimenID` (i.e. `123245111-33202R00111`))

inputSpec.name: exclude_samples_file
inputSpec.label: exclude samples file
inputSpec.help: file of samples to exclude from CNV calling / CNV reports, one sample name per line (as found in manifest)

inputSpec.name: manifest_subset
inputSpec.label: manifest subset
inputSpec.help: comma separated string of samples in manifest on which to ONLY run jobs (these should be formatted as ` InstrumentID-SpecimenID` (i.e. `123245111-33202R00111`))

inputSpec.name: single_output_dir
inputSpec.label: single output directory
inputSpec.help: path to output directory of dias single

inputSpec.name: cnv_call_job_id
inputSpec.label: CNV call job ID
inputSpec.help: job ID of CNV calling to use for generating CNV reports, if running calling and reports together the job ID of the calling job will be used

inputSpec.name: testing
inputSpec.label: testing
inputSpec.help: run in testing mode, will terminate all jobs

inputSpec.name: sample_limit
inputSpec.label: sample limit
inputSpec.help: no. of samples to limit launching reports workflow jobs for

inputSpec.name: unarchive
inputSpec.label: unarchive
inputSpec.help: controls whether to automatically unarchive any required files that are archived. Default is to fail the app with a list of files required to unarchive. If set to true, all required files will start to be unarchived and the job will exit with a zero exit code and the job tagged to state no jobs were launched

outputSpec.name: summary_report
outputSpec.label: summary report
outputSpec.help: text file with summary of jobs launched and any errors encountered

outputSpec.name: launched_jobs
outputSpec.label: launched jobs
outputSpec.help: comma separated string of launched jobs
